extensionDescription.message: Automatically switch Youtube to its built-in dark theme.

prefersColorSchemeDescription.message: Will follow browser/os system-level color scheme if browser supports it. (Priority 1)

timeBasedDescription.message: Will toggle dark theme only during certain hours. (Priority 2)

beforeHourDescription.message: Toggle dark theme before specified hour if time based toggle is activated.

afterHourDescription.message: Toggle dark theme after specified hour if time based toggle is activated.

settingsDesc.message: YtAutoDark keeps its default behavior, and gets some settings to adjust the way it's triggered.

colorSchemeDesc.message: If active, YtAutoDark follows browser/os system-level color scheme if browser supports it.

timeBasedDesc.message: If active, YtAutoDark will only toggle dark theme before and after the configured hours.

syncedDesc2.message: Settings will be shared across all instances of that browser that the user is logged into.

syncedDesc3.message: If synced storage is not available, it will automatically fallback to local storage.

installUpdateDesc.message: This page will allow users to be notified of new major versions.
